name: vizinn-monorepo
description: Vizinn monorepo containing frontend and backend applications

scripts.dev:backend: cd packages/backend && poetry run uvicorn backend.app:app --reload
scripts.start:backend: cd packages/backend && poetry run uvicorn backend.app:app --reload
scripts.start:alt: concurrently "cd packages/frontend-app && npx expo start" "cd packages/backend && poetry run uvicorn backend.app:app --reload" --names "FRONTEND,BACKEND" --prefix-colors "blue,green"
scripts.start:manual: echo 'Iniciando servidores separadamente para exibir QR code completo e todas as opÃ§Ãµes...' && echo 'Execute em um terminal: pnpm dev:app' && echo 'Execute em outro terminal: pnpm dev:backend'
